subject: Football
Video Recordings and Downloads
Hazing
lead_paragraph: Tom Coughlin and players were not happy that the video of second-year cornerback Prince Amukamara being tossed in an ice tub was released. Some viewers described the video content as bullying.
snippet: Tom Coughlin and players were not happy that the video of second-year cornerback Prince Amukamara being tossed in an ice tub was released. Some viewers described the video content as bullying.
